class_f_05_dragon_01: Hello, class! It is I, Hassel, yet again.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_02:
I’m pleased to say that everybody did very well
on the midterm exams.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_03:
As a reward for all of your hard work, we have
a special guest visiting us today![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_04: Now then, Brassie, please come in![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_kusa_02:
I am Brassius. I am an artist, and I focus
exclusively on Grass-type Pokémon for my work.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_dragon_05:
Brassius here mainly creates three-dimensional
pieces, such as statues and the like.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_06:
One of his major works is the installation titled
“Surrendering Sunflora,” found in Artazon.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_07:
Many of you who’ve challenged the Artazon Gym
are no doubt familiar with these sculptures.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_kusa_03:
Yes...I do recognize some faces among your
students.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_04:
I hope you all understand how fortunate you are
to be able to attend Hass’s classes.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_05:
Ol’ Hass is the man who saved me when I had
lost all hope and given up on myself.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_06:
But he never gave up on me. I do not exaggerate
when I say that he is my mentor in life![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_07:
It is precisely thanks to Hass that I was able to
establish my current art style.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_dragon_09:
I’ve nothing against reminiscing about old times,
but today, I hope you will guide this class in a\r
way only you can![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_kusa_09:
Let’s see... Ah, why don’t we discuss what Hass
mentioned—“Surrendering Sunflora”?[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_10:
Can anyone here tell what my mood was when I
crafted its detached expression?[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_11: No, no, no... Completely and utterly wrong![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_12:
When I made that sculpture, I had surrendered
all hope. I was prepared to give up everything.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_13:
I had resolved to give up my life as an artist if
that piece did not receive proper recognition.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_15:
When I started out as an artist, I experienced
many hardships. I even became deathly ill and\r
fell into a slump that drove me to desperation.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_16:
I began worrying only about what would sell.
I was concerned only with fame and fortune...[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_17:
But all of my pieces during this time had no
depth. They were all shallow trash![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_18:
It was then that I met Hass. He helped me realize
how petty I was being. I’ll spare you the details...\r
but in the end I was able to leave all that behind![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_19: And that is also when I crafted the Sunflora![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_dragon_11:
Remarkable! Even I did not know the full story
until now![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_kusa_20:
This kind of thing is hard to tell someone,
especially when they are so close to you.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_21:
Now, I don’t doubt that you adolescents will
often find your heads crowded with worries.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_22:
My advice to you is simple. Be honest with
yourself, and do whatever your heart desires.\r
...So long as you don’t cause trouble, that is.[VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_kusa_24:
I must admit I am beginning to feel a bit
embarrassed, so I bid you farewell, Hass!\r
And farewell to your pupils as well![VAR 0114(0017)]
class_f_05_dragon_12:
Oh Brassie, I can’t believe it... Such a wonderful...
class... Thank...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_05_dragon_14:
BWUUUH huh huh huh huh!
HUUUH huh hoi hoi hoi...[VAR 0114(0012)]
